events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team will start reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering as you applied for a software developer role requiring backend skills.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will contact you soon.
The initial screening interview has been completed successfully, confirming your technical background and motivation.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview scheduled next week.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 10th at 2 PM UTC to assess your coding and system design skills.
Your technical interview went very well, with strong problem-solving demonstrated during the live coding exercises.
We have scheduled an HR interview for May 15th to discuss role expectations, salary, and company culture with you.
The HR interview was positive, and you expressed strong alignment with our company values and career progression plans.
We have formally extended an offer for the Software Engineer position including details on salary, benefits, and start date.
You responded with enthusiastic feedback and minor questions regarding relocation assistance, which we can address.
You have officially accepted the offer, expressing excitement to join the engineering team and contribute to projects.
Onboarding activities have commenced, including account setups and introductions to key team members and mentors.
The hiring process has been successfully completed with you onboarded as a full member of the engineering staff.
